channel.title: Server 525: trading limitations
channel.description: i own a 525 server and trading works, id like to know if theres a way, i can put global item prices on an item, EXAMPLE: you know how runescape has a wealth trading limit... i wanna make that on my server, i want to make it so whenever someone trades someone the item has to equal the same value as the other player trading... so please any help would be very appreciated!

item.title: Server 525: trading limitations
item.dc:creator: @SethScape SethScape
item.description:
@SethScape wrote:

i own a 525 server and trading works, id like to know if theres a way, i can put global item prices on an item, EXAMPLE: you know how runescape has a wealth trading limit… i wanna make that on my server, i want to make it so whenever someone trades someone the item has to equal the same value as the other player trading… so please any help would be very appreciated!
